name: 3.//DAYS
description:
ENG 921: Fabuludus 2016 Submission.

Mom could see souls. But more than that, she could see Death, even before it happened.

I wonder if she saw her own before her killer shot her in the back of the head.


Escape from limbo in 3 days, or be doomed to relive it all.

3.//DAYS is a lucid dream experience where nothing makes sense, but reads like a story that does. The decisions and conclusion you come to are not based on fact, but emotion and experiences in real life. Here, the uncanny mixes with reality. The endings are divided into two parts, with a total of 4 possible combinations. Pay attention to variations in words (highlighted in blue) to determine where each new ending may start.
